languages.text: {n}Глейто стоически принимает удар, изготавливается к смертоносному прыжку, но... покорно опускается на брюхо с жалобным и разочарованным скулением. Из трещины на броне сочится струйка крови. Он горестно утыкается мордой в пол, раздавленный тяжестью протоколов, внедренных в его сознание.{/n}

{n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто стоически принимает удар, изготавливается к смертоносному прыжку, но... покорно опускается на брюхо с жалобным и разочарованным скулением. Из трещины на броне сочится струйка крови. Он горестно утыкается мордой в пол, раздавленный тяжестью протоколов, внедренных в его сознание.{/n}

{n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito lässt den Hieb stoisch über sich ergehen, macht sich sprungbereit und ... lässt sich mit einem frustrierten Winseln auf seinen Bauch fallen. Aus einem Riss in seiner Panzerung rinnt Blut. Er legt traurig den Kopf auf den Boden, erdrückt von der Last der Protokolle in seinem Verstand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito lässt den Hieb stoisch über sich ergehen, macht sich sprungbereit und ... lässt sich mit einem frustrierten Winseln auf seinen Bauch fallen. Aus einem Riss in seiner Panzerung rinnt Blut. Er legt traurig den Kopf auf den Boden, erdrückt von der Last der Protokolle in seinem Verstand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito encaisse le coup stoïquement, puis se met en position pour vous attaquer et... s'effondre sur le ventre en poussant un gémissement de frustration. Un filet de sang s'écoule d'une fissure dans son armure. Il pose la tête au sol d'un air penaud, écrasé sous le poids des protocoles implantés dans son esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito encaisse le coup stoïquement, puis se met en position pour vous attaquer et... s'effondre sur le ventre en poussant un gémissement de frustration. Un filet de sang s'écoule d'une fissure dans son armure. Il pose la tête au sol d'un air penaud, écrasé sous le poids des protocoles implantés dans son esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトはその一撃に黙って耐え、致命的な突進の構えを見せたかと思うと…哀れで悔しげなかすれた鳴き声を漏らしながら、おとなしく腹ばいになった。装甲のひび割れから血がじわりとにじみ出ている。彼は悲しげに顔を床に伏せた。心に刻まれたプロトコルの重圧に押し潰されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトはその一撃に黙って耐え、致命的な突進の構えを見せたかと思うと…哀れで悔しげなかすれた鳴き声を漏らしながら、おとなしく腹ばいになった。装甲のひび割れから血がじわりとにじみ出ている。彼は悲しげに顔を床に伏せた。心に刻まれたプロトコルの重圧に押し潰されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito encaja el golpe con entereza, se prepara para abalanzarse y... se agazapa con un gemido lastimero y frustrado. Un hilillo de sangre rezuma de una grieta en su armadura. Pesaroso, apoya la cara en el suelo, aplastado por el peso de los protocolos de su mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito encaja el golpe con entereza, se prepara para abalanzarse y... se agazapa con un gemido lastimero y frustrado. Un hilillo de sangre rezuma de una grieta en su armadura. Pesaroso, apoya la cara en el suelo, aplastado por el peso de los protocolos de su mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托忍受住了你的攻击，随时准备扑向你，但随后……它却无力地倒在地上，四脚朝天，发出了可怜、沮丧的呜咽声。鲜血从它盔甲的裂缝里渗出来。它哀伤地将脸贴在地板上，被烙在脑海中的协议压得喘不过气来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托忍受住了你的攻击，随时准备扑向你，但随后……它却无力地倒在地上，四脚朝天，发出了可怜、沮丧的呜咽声。鲜血从它盔甲的裂缝里渗出来。它哀伤地将脸贴在地板上，被烙在脑海中的协议压得喘不过气来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito; darbeye cesurca göğüs geriyor, öldürücü saldırısını yapmak üzere hazırlığa geçiyor ve... Acıklı, yılgın bir sızlamayla uysallaşıp karnının üzerine yatıveriyor. Çatlamış zırhından damla damla kan sızıyor. Zihnine nakşolmuş protokollerin ağırlığı altında ezilen yüzünü kederle yere yaslıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito endures the blow stoically, prepares to make a deadly lunge, and... drops meekly to his belly with a pitiful and frustrated whimper. A trickle of blood oozes from a crack in his armour. He sorrowfully rests his face on the floor, crushed by the weight of the protocols embedded in his mind.{/n}
